**钢盔**（helmet）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[头盔](/wiki/%E5%A4%B4%E7%9B%94 "头盔")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")制成，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观是[随机](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%8F%E6%9C%BA%E5%A4%96%E8%A7%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "随机外观 (page does not exist)")的[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。[武士](/index.php?title=%E6%AD%A6%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "武士 (page does not exist)")称呼该物品为**兜**（kabuto）。

[ ]

## 生成

[骑士](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%91%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骑士 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时会获得一顶+0钢盔[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。各种以近战为主的职业，包括[野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人 (page does not exist)")、[僧侣](/index.php?title=%E5%83%A7%E4%BE%A3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "僧侣 (page does not exist)")、[武士](/index.php?title=%E6%AD%A6%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "武士 (page does not exist)")和[女武神](/index.php?title=%E5%A5%B3%E6%AD%A6%E7%A5%9E\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "女武神 (page does not exist)")，在游戏开始时即鉴定钢盔[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)[\[7\]](#cite_note-7)。

[雇佣兵](/index.php?title=%E9%9B%87%E4%BD%A3%E5%85%B5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "雇佣兵 (page does not exist)")在生成时有2⁄3的概率[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")钢盔[\[8\]](#cite_note-8)。

## 描述

钢盔的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为1，且可能会根据其[随机外观](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%8F%E6%9C%BA%E5%A4%96%E8%A7%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "随机外观 (page does not exist)")赋予穿戴者特殊效果。由于材料是[金属类](/index.php?title=%E9%87%91%E5%B1%9E%E7%B1%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "金属类 (page does not exist)")，所以钢盔会阻碍[施法](/index.php?title=%E6%96%BD%E6%B3%95\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "施法 (page does not exist)")，但能够抵御落石的伤害。

## 策略

钢盔是随机外观头盔中最平庸的一种。虽然确实有一些实用性，但由于有更容易找到的[兽人头盔](/wiki/%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%E5%A4%B4%E7%9B%94 "兽人头盔")，以及重量更轻的[瘪锅](/wiki/%E7%98%AA%E9%94%85 "瘪锅")的存在，钢盔基本没有使用机会。

钢盔一般会随着游戏流程推进而被[精灵皮帽](/wiki/%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%E7%9A%AE%E5%B8%BD "精灵皮帽")或是其他使用的随机头盔取代，即使是[矮人铁头盔](/wiki/%E7%9F%AE%E4%BA%BA%E9%93%81%E5%A4%B4%E7%9B%94 "矮人铁头盔")也比钢盔更实用。

### 鉴定

钢盔可以通过价格或重量来和其他随机外观头盔区分：钢盔的基础价是10 [zm](/wiki/Zm/zh-CN "Zm/zh-CN")，其他随机头盔都是50 zm；钢盔的重量是30 [aum](/index.php?title=Aum/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Aum/zh-CN (page does not exist)")，其他随机头盔均重50 aum。

## 历史

钢盔最初于[Hack 1.0](/wiki/Hack_1.0 "Hack 1.0")加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Helmet/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

In variants where item weight is shown, helmets are somewhat easier to identify.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [Undead Slayers](/wiki/Undead_Slayer "Undead Slayer") can start the game with a +0 helmet unless they are elves or orcs, who will start with the appropriate racial helm in those cases.

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), a [helm of telepathy](/wiki/Helm_of_telepathy "Helm of telepathy") can be created at a [furnace](/wiki/Furnace "Furnace") by combining a plain helmet and an [amulet of ESP](/wiki/Amulet_of_ESP "Amulet of ESP").

### notdNetHack

[notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") adds [The Crown of Berith](/wiki/The_Crown_of_Berith "The Crown of Berith"), a [golden](/wiki/Gold_\(material\) "Gold (material)") artifact helmet than protects against brain-sucking attacks while worn and can be safely enchanted to +7. [Berith](/wiki/Berith "Berith") himself is generated with this helm when summoned by an [Illithanachronounbinder](/wiki/Illithanachronounbinder "Illithanachronounbinder").

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), [giant](/wiki/Giant_\(starting_race\) "Giant (starting race)") Barbarians and [Cavemen](/wiki/Cavemen "Cavemen") receive a helmet in place of the role's standard armor.

[Flinds](/wiki/Flind_\(EvilHack\) "Flind (EvilHack)") have a 1⁄4 chance of generating with a helmet, and [shopkeepers](/wiki/Shopkeeper "Shopkeeper") have a 1⁄4 chance of generating with a helmet; [Croesus](/wiki/Croesus "Croesus") has a 1⁄2 chance of generating with a [golden](/wiki/Gold_\(material\) "Gold (material)") helmet, and [Kas](/wiki/Kas "Kas") is always generated with a helmet. Mercenaries will often generate with helmets unless they are [drow](/wiki/Drow_\(monster_attribute\) "Drow (monster attribute)"), [elves](/wiki/Elf_\(monster_attribute\) "Elf (monster attribute)") or [orcs](/wiki/Orc_\(monster_attribute\) "Orc (monster attribute)"), and the helmet also appears in the kits of various [player monsters](/wiki/Player_monster_\(EvilHack\) "Player monster (EvilHack)"), particularly lower-level ones.

A helmet can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining a dented pot and a [dagger](/wiki/Dagger "Dagger"). Helmets can be used to forge several items:

- A helmet can be combined with a dagger to create a [small shield](/wiki/Small_shield "Small shield").
- Two helmets can be combined to create a [large shield](/wiki/Large_shield "Large shield").
- A helmet can be combined with a large shield to create [ring mail](/wiki/Ring_mail "Ring mail").
- A helmet can be combined with ring mail to create [scale mail](/wiki/Scale_mail "Scale mail").
- A helmet can be combined with a [dwarvish short sword](/wiki/Dwarvish_short_sword "Dwarvish short sword") to create a [dwarvish helm](/wiki/Dwarvish_helm "Dwarvish helm").
- A helmet can be combined with a [mace](/wiki/Mace "Mace") to create a pair of [gauntlets](/wiki/Gauntlets_\(EvilHack\) "Gauntlets (EvilHack)").

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), in addition to SLASH'EM details, [Paladins](/wiki/Paladin_\(role\) "Paladin (role)") start the game with a helmet unless they are elves or dwarves, who will start with the appropriate racial helm in those cases.

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), [tortle](/wiki/Tortle_\(starting_race\) "Tortle (starting race)") Undead Slayers receive a [toque](/wiki/Toque "Toque") in place of the standard helmet.

[Padawans](/wiki/Padawan "Padawan") and [Jedi trainers](/index.php?title=Jedi_trainers\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Jedi trainers (page does not exist)") have a 1⁄4 chance of generating with a helmet. All details from SLASH'EM and EvilHack are applicable.

## 百科文本

### 兜

The kabuto is the helmet worn by the samurai. It was characterized by a prominent beaked front which jutted out over the brow to protect the wearer's face; a feature that gives rise to their modern Japanese name of 'shokaku tsuki kabuto' (battering-ram helmet). Their main constructional element was an oval plate, the shokaku bo, slightly domed for the head with a narrow prolongation in front that curved forwards and downwards where it developed a pronounced central fold. Two horizontal strips encircling the head were riveted to this frontal strip: the lower one, the koshimaki (hip wrap), formed the lower edge of the helmet bowl; the other, the do maki (body wrap), was set at about the level of the temples. Filling the gaps between these strips and the shokaku bo were small plates, sometimes triangular but more commonly rectangular in shape. Because the front projected so far from the head, the triangular gap beneath was filled by a small plate, the shoshaku tei ita, whose rear edge bent downwards into a flange that rested against the forehead.

\[ Arms & Armor of the Samurai, by Bottomley & Hopson ]

钢盔（helmet）是NetHack中的一种头盔类防具。它由铁制成，未鉴定时外观是随机的[1]。武士称呼该物品为兜（kabuto）。

生成

骑士在游戏开始时会获得一顶+0钢盔[2]。各种以近战为主的职业，包括野蛮人、僧侣、武士和女武神，在游戏开始时即鉴定钢盔[3][4][5][6][7]。

雇佣兵在生成时有2⁄3的概率携带钢盔[8]。

描述

钢盔的基础AC加成为1，且可能会根据其随机外观赋予穿戴者特殊效果。由于材料是金属类，所以钢盔会阻碍施法，但能够抵御落石的伤害。

策略

钢盔是随机外观头盔中最平庸的一种。虽然确实有一些实用性，但由于有更容易找到的兽人头盔，以及重量更轻的瘪锅的存在，钢盔基本没有使用机会。

钢盔一般会随着游戏流程推进而被精灵皮帽或是其他使用的随机头盔取代，即使是矮人铁头盔也比钢盔更实用。

鉴定

钢盔可以通过价格或重量来和其他随机外观头盔区分：钢盔的基础价是10 zm，其他随机头盔都是50 zm；钢盔的重量是30 aum，其他随机头盔均重50 aum。

历史

钢盔最初于Hack 1.0加入游戏。

Variants

In variants where item weight is shown, helmets are somewhat easier to identify.

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, Undead Slayers can start the game with a +0 helmet unless they are elves or orcs, who will start with the appropriate racial helm in those cases.

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, a helm of telepathy can be created at a furnace by combining a plain helmet and an amulet of ESP.

notdNetHack

notdNetHack adds The Crown of Berith, a golden artifact helmet than protects against brain-sucking attacks while worn and can be safely enchanted to +7. Berith himself is generated with this helm when summoned by an Illithanachronounbinder.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, giant Barbarians and Cavemen receive a helmet in place of the role's standard armor.

Flinds have a 1⁄4 chance of generating with a helmet, and shopkeepers have a 1⁄4 chance of generating with a helmet; Croesus has a 1⁄2 chance of generating with a golden helmet, and Kas is always generated with a helmet. Mercenaries will often generate with helmets unless they are drow, elves or orcs, and the helmet also appears in the kits of various player monsters, particularly lower-level ones.

A helmet can be created at a forge by combining a dented pot and a dagger. Helmets can be used to forge several items:

  • A helmet can be combined with a dagger to create a small shield.
  • Two helmets can be combined to create a large shield.
  • A helmet can be combined with a large shield to create ring mail.
  • A helmet can be combined with ring mail to create scale mail.
  • A helmet can be combined with a dwarvish short sword to create a dwarvish helm.
  • A helmet can be combined with a mace to create a pair of gauntlets.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, in addition to SLASH'EM details, Paladins start the game with a helmet unless they are elves or dwarves, who will start with the appropriate racial helm in those cases.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, tortle Undead Slayers receive a toque in place of the standard helmet.

Padawans and Jedi trainers have a 1⁄4 chance of generating with a helmet. All details from SLASH'EM and EvilHack are applicable.

The kabuto is the helmet worn by the samurai. It was characterized by a prominent beaked front which jutted out over the brow to protect the wearer's face; a feature that gives rise to their modern Japanese name of 'shokaku tsuki kabuto' (battering-ram helmet). Their main constructional element was an oval plate, the shokaku bo, slightly domed for the head with a narrow prolongation in front that curved forwards and downwards where it developed a pronounced central fold. Two horizontal strips encircling the head were riveted to this frontal strip: the lower one, the koshimaki (hip wrap), formed the lower edge of the helmet bowl; the other, the do maki (body wrap), was set at about the level of the temples. Filling the gaps between these strips and the shokaku bo were small plates, sometimes triangular but more commonly rectangular in shape. Because the front projected so far from the head, the triangular gap beneath was filled by a small plate, the shoshaku tei ita, whose rear edge bent downwards into a flange that rested against the forehead.

[ Arms & Armor of the Samurai, by Bottomley & Hopson ]

'''钢盔'''（helmet）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[头盔]]类[[防具]]。它由[[铁]]制成，未[[鉴定]]时外观是[[随机外观|随机]]的{{refsrc|src/objects.c|470|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。[[武士]]称呼该物品为'''兜'''（kabuto）。

== 生成 ==
[[骑士]]在游戏开始时会获得一顶+0钢盔{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|77|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。各种以近战为主的职业，包括[[野蛮人]]、[[僧侣]]、[[武士]]和[[女武神]]，在游戏开始时即鉴定钢盔{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|688|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|688|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|721|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|764|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|786|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

[[雇佣兵]]在生成时有{{frac|2|3}}的概率[[怪物起始物品|携带]]钢盔{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|634|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

== 描述 ==
钢盔的基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成为1，且可能会根据其[[随机外观]]赋予穿戴者特殊效果。由于材料是[[金属类]]，所以钢盔会阻碍[[施法]]，但能够抵御落石的伤害。

== 策略 ==
钢盔是随机外观头盔中最平庸的一种。虽然确实有一些实用性，但由于有更容易找到的[[兽人头盔]]，以及重量更轻的[[瘪锅]]的存在，钢盔基本没有使用机会。

钢盔一般会随着游戏流程推进而被[[精灵皮帽]]或是其他使用的随机头盔取代，即使是[[矮人铁头盔]]也比钢盔更实用。

=== 鉴定 ===
钢盔可以通过价格或重量来和其他随机外观头盔区分：钢盔的基础价是10 {{cnlink|zm}}，其他随机头盔都是50 zm；钢盔的重量是30 {{cnlink|aum}}，其他随机头盔均重50 aum。

== 历史 ==
钢盔最初于[[Hack 1.0]]加入游戏。

==Variants==
{{translation/zh-CN|n}}
In variants where item weight is shown, helmets are somewhat easier to identify.

===SLASH'EM===
In [[SLASH'EM]], [[Undead Slayer]]s can start the game with a +0 helmet unless they are elves or orcs, who will start with the appropriate racial helm in those cases.

===SpliceHack===
In [[SpliceHack]], a [[helm of telepathy]] can be created at a [[furnace]] by combining a plain helmet and an [[amulet of ESP]].

===notdNetHack===
[[notdNetHack]] adds [[The Crown of Berith]], a [[Gold (material)|golden]] artifact helmet than protects against brain-sucking attacks while worn and can be safely enchanted to +7. [[Berith]] himself is generated with this helm when summoned by an [[Illithanachronounbinder]].

===EvilHack===
In [[EvilHack]], [[Giant (starting race)|giant]] Barbarians and [[Cavemen]] receive a helmet in place of the role's standard armor.

[[Flind (EvilHack)|Flinds]] have a {{frac|4}} chance of generating with a helmet, and [[shopkeeper]]s have a {{frac|4}} chance of generating with a helmet; [[Croesus]] has a {{frac|2}} chance of generating with a [[Gold (material)|golden]] helmet, and [[Kas]] is always generated with a helmet. Mercenaries will often generate with helmets unless they are [[Drow (monster attribute)|drow]], [[Elf (monster attribute)|elves]] or [[Orc (monster attribute)|orcs]], and the helmet also appears in the kits of various [[Player monster (EvilHack)|player monsters]], particularly lower-level ones.

A helmet can be created at a [[Forge (dungeon feature)|forge]] by combining a dented pot and a [[dagger]]. Helmets can be used to forge several items:

* A helmet can be combined with a dagger to create a [[small shield]].
* Two helmets can be combined to create a [[large shield]].
* A helmet can be combined with a large shield to create [[ring mail]].
* A helmet can be combined with ring mail to create [[scale mail]].
* A helmet can be combined with a [[dwarvish short sword]] to create a [[dwarvish helm]].
* A helmet can be combined with a [[mace]] to create a pair of [[Gauntlets (EvilHack)|gauntlets]].

===SlashTHEM===
In [[SlashTHEM]], in addition to SLASH'EM details, [[Paladin (role)|Paladins]] start the game with a helmet unless they are elves or dwarves, who will start with the appropriate racial helm in those cases.

===Hack'EM===
In [[Hack'EM]], [[Tortle (starting race)|tortle]] Undead Slayers receive a [[toque]] in place of the standard helmet.

[[Padawan]]s and [[Jedi trainers]] have a {{frac|4}} chance of generating with a helmet. All details from SLASH'EM and EvilHack are applicable.

== 百科文本 ==
=== 兜 ===
{{encyclopedia|
The kabuto is the helmet worn by the samurai.  It was characterized by a prominent beaked front which jutted out over the brow to protect the wearer's face; a feature that gives rise to their modern Japanese name of 'shokaku tsuki kabuto' (battering-ram helmet).  Their main constructional element was an oval plate, the shokaku bo, slightly domed for the head with a narrow prolongation in front that curved forwards and downwards where it developed a pronounced central fold.  Two horizontal strips encircling the head were riveted to this frontal strip:  the lower one, the koshimaki (hip wrap), formed the lower edge of the helmet bowl; the other, the do maki (body wrap), was set at about the level of the temples.  Filling the gaps between these strips and the shokaku bo were small plates, sometimes triangular but more commonly rectangular in shape.  Because the front projected so far from the head, the triangular gap beneath was filled by a small plate, the shoshaku tei ita, whose rear edge bent downwards into a flange that rested against the forehead.
|[ Arms & Armor of the Samurai, by Bottomley & Hopson ]
}}
